node.title: Mindful Eating
node.label: 7. June 2020
node.introduction: Have you heard of Mindful Eating?

node.title: Oral Health and Overall Health
node.label: 19. May 2020
node.introduction: How much do you know? Maybe you haven't given it much thought, after all who thinks that joint pain, confusion or heart health is related to their mouth. Surprisingly it is!

node.title: Dogs and Gut Health
node.label: 15. May 2020
node.introduction: If you have a dog, ask yourself this question. Why did you make the decision to get him or her?

node.title: Blackberry, Banana & Hazelnut Breakfast Flapjacks
node.introduction: These flapjacks are the perfect grab and go snack, treat or breakfast.

node.cover_image_alt: Photo of a tray of flapjacks

node.title: Zingy Pineapple & Turmeric Smoothie
node.introduction: This refreshing immune supportive smoothie is packed with valuable nutrients. The pineapple, ginger and turmeric provide vitamin C and manganese crucial for brain health.

node.title: Coconut, Cacao Chia Pots
node.introduction: These creamy pots of yumminess are packed full of fibre and heart health omega 3 fats. They also happen to be vegan, gluten and dairy free! Enjoy at breakfast or anytime of the day!

node.text:
Today's weather 🌧️🌧️🌧️ calls for something to add a little heat to my life! And that comes in the form of a Mexican style breakfast burrito & coffee. Thank you @granluchito for the best chipotle chilli paste ever 🙏
Starting the day off with eggs, which are a great source of protein is a regular occurrence in my house. Eating protein at breakfast is a good way to help keep blood sugar balanced and keep you full until lunchtime. I also added cherry tomatoes, red chilli and coriander to boost my intake of vitamins and minerals and help contribute to my veg intake. The coffee needs no explanation ☕😎

#breakfastburritos #spiceupyourbreakfast #bloodsugarbalance #coffeeonceaday #10aday #dairyfreeglutenfreesugarfree #eggsforbreakfast #goodfoodforgood #rebalancingyoucommunity #eatarainbow #energybalance #rebalancingyou #keepsyoufullerforlonger #rainraingoaway #ilovebreakfast

Who said you can't have Cake for breakfast!! 😎 #livingthedream 
Whilst this may look like cake and it kinda is it's actually more a breakfast style bread packed full of delicious healthful ingredients. 
I was getting bored of my usual pecan banana bread so I changed it up and added walnuts, blueberries and cardamom. 
As well as tasting great it will keep me full for ages and it just makes me smile because I love cake!!! 
#cakeforbreakfast #bloodsugarbalance #keepsyoufullerforlonger #smoothielife #rebalancingyoucommunity #lovetobake #rebalancingyou #quickbreakfastides #glutendairysoyfree #glutenfreebreakfastideas #glutendairyfree #eatmoreplants #plantbased ed

Every 6 weeks or so, I send out the Rebalancing You News Edit featuring; nourishing nutrition tips and tricks, new recipes for you to enjoy and interesting articles to read. As well as things I love and think you might love too!
When you sign up, you also get a copy of 'The Ultimate Healthful, Well Stocked Kitchen' which is followed by a short recipe E-book full of delicious health giving recipes.
If you’re interested in your health & wellness, adding to your recipe repertoire and getting some handy tips on how to eat in a way that can energise, restore and nourish your mind body and soul it's worth joining the Rebalancing You community!
.
This time I will be sharing:
✨Amazing side salad recipes inspired by @kitchenstarscookingschool 'Around the World' Summer Cooking Series. 
✨Some tips on how to deal with picky eaters.
✨ Top tips to help you navigate 'Organic September' a month long campaign to raise awareness of organic produce. 
✨An interesting article on Respecting Food
.
It will be out early next week. You can join via the sign-up page on my website (link in bio) - or if you prefer DM me and I can add you.

Have a fabulous weekend 
Emma x 

#healthyrecipes #wholefoodrecipes #nourishingnutrition #personalisednutritiontips #healthandnutritiontips #foodlove #healthandwellbeing #summereating #summercooking #pickyeaters #rebalancingyou #newsedit #aroundtheworldcooking #rebalancingyoucommunity #respectingfood #foodrespect #organicmonth

metadata.siteDescription: ENERGISE, RESTORE, NOURISH. I'm studying with the renowned Institute for Optimum Nutrition and will qualify next year. Until then, this is a place to inspire and share healthful information, tips, tricks and recipes. I hope to energise, restore and nourish your body mind and soul!
